# particleLifeSpanVariation

**Instance Property**

The range, in seconds, of randomized particle life spans. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var particleLifeSpanVariation: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting a nonzero value for this property randomizes the effect of the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleLifeSpan] property. SceneKit randomly adjusts the life span of each particle by up to half the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleLifeSpanVariation] value. For example, if the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleLifeSpan] value is `1.0` seconds and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleLifeSpanVariation] value is `0.5` seconds, each particle appears for a random duration between `0.75` and `1.25` seconds before being removed from the scene.

The default value is `0.0` seconds, specifying no randomization.

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].

## Managing Particle Motion

- **particleAngle**: The rotation angle, in degrees, of newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **particleAngleVariation**: The range, in degrees of randomized initial particle angles. Animatable.
- **particleVelocity**: The initial speed, in units per second, for newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **particleVelocityVariation**: The range, in units per second, of randomized initial particle speeds. Animatable.
- **particleAngularVelocity**: The initial spin rate, in degrees per second, of newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **particleAngularVelocityVariation**: The range, in degrees per second, of randomized initial angular velocities for particles. Animatable.
- **particleLifeSpan**: The duration, in seconds, for which each particle is rendered before being removed from the scene. Animatable.
